definition: to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: Objective To probe the cases of the surface decline in Murphy's dropper while transfusion .

sentences.english: The nevirapine is contained in a small dropper placed inside the pouch.

sentences.english: When a second, or third, fly is used, it is called a dropper fly .
sentences.chinese: 当第二次或第三次，是用来飞，称为滴管飞。
但是现在我成了一个滴管了。

sentences.english: To determine potassium iodate in edible salt, the specification of home-made capillary burette is 0.

sentences.english: Experiments were carried out on laboratory-scale pulverized coal combustion with different adsorbents.

sentences.english: And introduce the conception of the dropper function and deduction of math expression.

sentences.english: Do not touch dropper tip to the eye, eyelid or to any other object.

sentences.english: You now have a dropper fly set up.

sentences.english: Squeeze the rubber bulb and insert the dropper into the bottle.

sentences.english: A young mouse lemur gets its daily sustenance from an eye - dropper.
